front.title: The IP Geolocation HTTP Client Hint

abstract.t: This documents defines an HTTP Client Hint that allows a client to share information about its IP Geolocation. This helps ensure that servers have information about location that is consistent with what a client expects and what other servers use. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/tfpauly/privacy-proxy.
